message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable asset that I believe will be of great benefit to your business.  I'm confident its worth is at least $1,000,000 to you. To make this a mutually beneficial transaction, I'm willing to let it go for $950,000. This price reflects a significant value proposition for you, while still allowing me to achieve a favorable outcome.  Let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.
